item.title: @elonmusk: Welcome to Minneapolis. A town where your likelihood of parking in front of a random daycare is sign...
item.description: Welcome to Minneapolis. A town where your likelihood of parking in front of a random daycare is significantly higher than most towns. A town where the restaurants that donâ€™t cook food make more money than those that do. Why deal with customers, complaints, staff etc when you can instead just serve the government with your â€œprotected identity?â€ A town where 100+ year old local, white businesses get pushed out and turned into Halal restaurants, Islamic centers, and mosques. A place where you feel pressured to not walk alone and with your hair out, because itâ€™s just soooo incredibly inappropriate. I mean just think about all the welfare men who loiter and monitor the streets as a career, surely the temptation of a woman wearing jeans could be too much for them to handle. Also, We the People are told itâ€™s too expensive to have kids while Somalians are religiously and monetarily encouraged to have 9+. What will become of us?
